titles.title: To reduce temporarily the duty on Thiencarbazone-methyl.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 4/25/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce temporarily the duty on Thiencarbazone-methyl.
